data.title: The Reef: Shark Bait
data.meta_description: The Reef: Shark Bait, Originally known as Pi's Story (파이 스토리) in South Korea, is a computer animated film. The film was released on February 9, 2007 in the UK and direct-to-video in North America on October 9, 2007. The Reef 2: High Tide The Reef at the Internet Movie Database
data.text:
The Reef: Shark Bait, Originally known as Pi's Story (파이 스토리) in South Korea, is a computer animated film. The film was released on February 9, 2007 in the UK and direct-to-video in North America on October 9, 2007.
